// name age }) æ­£åˆ™çš„åˆ†ç»„å’Œå¼•ç”¨1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435é—®é¢˜1ï¼šæŠŠå­—ç¬¦ä¸²åˆ‡æˆè¿ç»­ç›¸åŒå­—ç¬¦çš„æ­£åˆ™æ€ä¹ˆå†™ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚abbcccddddåˆ‡æˆa,bb,ccc,ddddlet str = "abbcccdddd", reg = /(\w)\1*/g; // \1è¡¨ç¤ºç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª()åŒ¹é…çš„å€¼ str.match(reg); // ["a", "bb", "cc", "ddd"]é—®é¢˜2: ç”¨obj={name:"Tom",age: 23}é‡Œçš„å˜é‡æ›¿æ¢æ¨¡ç‰ˆ my name is {{name}}, my age is {{age}} let tmpl = "my name is {{name}}, my age is {{age}}", data = { name: "Tom", age: 23 };function template(tmpl, data){ let reg = /\{\{([a-zA-Z_$]+)\}\}/g; return tmpl = tmpl.replace(reg, function(_,...[$1]) { return data[$1]; })}template(tmpl,data) //my name is Tom, my age is 23é—®é¢˜3 è§£æhttps://baidu.com?name="Tom"&age=23#videoå‚æ•°let url = 'https://baidu.com?name="Tom"&age=23#video' function queryUrlParams(url) { let params = {}, hashReg = /#([^?=&#]+)/g url.replace(/([^?=&#]+)=([^?=&#]+)/g, function (_,...[$1,$2]) { params[$1] = $2 }) if (hashReg.test(url)) { url.replace(hashReg, function (_,...[$1]) { params["hash"] = $1 }) } return params;}queryUrlParams(url) // { name: '"Tom"', age: '23', hash: 'video' } æ­£åˆ™æ•è·çš„è´ªå©ªæ€§ é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œæ­£åˆ™æ•è·çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼ŒåŒ¹é…å­—ç¬¦å°½å¯èƒ½å¤šçš„åŒ¹é…ï¼Œè¿™ç§è¡Œä¸ºè¢«ç§°ä¹‹ä¸ºâ€è´ªå©ªâ€åŒ¹é…ã€‚ 123let str = "ä»Šå¹´æ˜¯2020å¹´", reg = /\d+/g str.match(reg) // ["2020"] å½“æˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾å¼è¿›è¡Œéè´ªå©ªåŒ¹é…åªéœ€åœ¨å¸¦åŒ¹é…çš„å­—ç¬¦åè·Ÿéšä¸€ä¸ªâ“å³å¯ã€‚ let str = "ä»Šå¹´æ˜¯2020å¹´", reg = /\d+?/g str.match(reg) // ['2', '0', '2', '0'] ï¼Ÿå¸¸è§çš„å‡ ç§ç”¨æ³• x? åŒ¹é…0æˆ–è€…ä¸€æ¬¡ ?? +? *? {1,5}? å–æ¶ˆæ•è·æ—¶çš„è´ªå©ªæ€§ (?:) åªåŒ¹é…ä¸æ•è· (?=) æ­£å‘é¢„æŸ¥ (?!) åå‘é¢„æŸ¥ (?<=y)x xåªæœ‰åœ¨yåé¢æ‰åŒ¹é… (?<!y)x xåªæœ‰ä¸åœ¨yåé¢æ‰åŒ¹é…

entry.title: ä»é›¶æ­å»ºè‡ªå·±çš„Reacté¡¹ç›®
entry.content: çŸ¥è¯†åœ°å›¾ å¼€å§‹å·¥ä½œä¹‹å‰æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦äº†è§£çš„çŸ¥è¯†ç‚¹ï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹é“¾æ¥å¯èƒ½æŸç§åŸå› æ— æ³•è®¿é—®ï¼Œå¯æŸ¥çœ‹å¯¹åº”çš„ä¸­æ–‡æ–‡æ¡£ webpack React React-Router Redux React-Redux Redux-Saga ant-design é…ç½®webpacké‡åˆ°çš„é—®é¢˜ issues1: https://github.com/parcel-bundler/parcel/issues/1195 1234567## solution loader: 'less-loader',options: { lessOptions: { javascriptEnabled: true }} issues2ï¼šhttps://github.com/ant-design/ant-design/issues/3442 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849å¼€å¯css-modulesé¢„ç¼–è¯‘æ—¶å°†ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹åŒ…æ’é™¤{ test: /\.less$/, use: [ isPro ? MiniCssExtractPlugin.loader : "style-loader", { loader: 'css-loader', options: { sourceMap: !isPro } }, 'postcss-loader', { loader: 'less-loader', options: { lessOptions: { javascriptEnabled: true } } } ], exclude: [ /node_modules/ ]}, { test: /\.less$/, use: [ isPro ? MiniCssExtractPlugin.loader : "style-loader", { loader: 'css-loader', options: { sourceMap: !isPro } }, 'postcss-loader', { loader: 'less-loader', options: { lessOptions: { javascriptEnabled: true } } } ], include: [ /node_modules/ ] } å¼•å…¥redux react-redux redux-saga å…¥å£æ–‡ä»¶main.js123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627import React from 'react';import ReactDOM from 'react-dom';import { Provider } from 'react-redux';import store from './src/store';import './index.scss';import Counter from './src/App';import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, Link} from "react-router-dom";ReactDOM.render( <Provider store={ store }> <Router> <ul> <li> <Link to="/">è®¡æ•°å™¨</Link> </li> </ul> <Switch> <Route exact path="/" children={<Counter />} /> </Switch> </Router> </Provider>, document.getElementById( 'root' )); store.js 123456789import { createStore, applyMiddleware } from 'redux';import rootReducer from "../reducers";import rootSaga from '../sagas/rootSaga';import createSagaMiddleware from 'redux-saga';const sagaMiddleware = createSagaMiddleware();const store = createStore( rootReducer, applyMiddleware( sagaMiddleware ) );sagaMiddleware.run( rootSaga );export default store; reducers/rootReduce.js123456import { combineReducers } from 'redux';import counter from './counter';const rootReducer = combineReducers( { counter} );export default rootReducer; reducers/counter.js 12345678910111213141516const initState = { count: 0, chartName: 'åˆå§‹åŒ–çš„æ•°æ®'};export default function counter ( state = initState, action ) { switch ( action.type ) { case "INCREMENT": return { ...state, count: state.count + 1 }; case "DECREMENT": return { ...state, count: state.count - 1 }; case "SAVE": return { ...state, ...action.payload }; default: return state; }} saga.js1234567891011121314151617181920import { all, call, takeEvery, put } from 'redux-saga/effects';import { getLists } from '@/Apis/counter';function* getList ( { payload } ) { const { data: { chartName } } = yield call( getLists, payload ); yield put( { type: 'SAVE', payload: { chartName } } );}function* watchGetList () { yield takeEvery( 'GET_LIST', getList );}function* rootSaga () { yield all( [ watchGetList() ] );}export default rootSaga; apis/counters.js 12345678910import request from '@/utils/request';export function getLists ( query ) { return request( { url: '/v1/bpi/currentprice.json', method: 'get', params: query } );} counter.jsx12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152import React from "react";import { connect } from "react-redux";import { Button, Table, Tag, Space } from "antd";import styles from "./app.scss";class Counter extends React.Component { handleIncrement = () => { this.props.dispatch( { type: "INCREMENT", payload: 0, } ); }; handleDecrement = () => { this.props.dispatch( { type: "DECREMENT", payload: 0, } ); }; handleGetList = () => { this.props.dispatch( { type: "GET_LIST" } ); }; render () { const { counter: { count, chartName }, } = this.props; return ( <div style={{ textAlign: "center", marginTop: "100px" }}> <h1>{chartName}</h1> <h1 className={styles.center}>è®¡æ•°å™¨ï¼š{count}</h1> <Button type="primary" onClick={this.handleIncrement}> + </Button> <Button type="primary" onClick={this.handleDecrement}> - </Button> <Button type="primary" onClick={this.handleGetList}> æ›´æ–°è§†å›¾ </Button> </div> ); }}const mapStateToProps = ( state ) => { return { counter: state.counter, };};export default connect( mapStateToProps )( Counter ); demoæˆªå›¾ ç‚¹å‡»æŒ‰é’®+é€’å¢ã€ç‚¹å‡»æŒ‰é’®-é€’å‡ã€ç‚¹å‡»æŒ‰é’®æ›´æ–°è§†å›¾æ›¿æ¢åˆå§‹åŒ–æ•°æ®ã€‚æ¥å£åœ°å€ https://api.coindesk.com/v1/bpi/currentprice.json

entry.title: å˜æ¢è«æµ‹çš„this
entry.content: ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦ç”¨this æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦ç”¨thisä»¥åŠåœ¨å“ªç§åœºæ™¯ä¼šç”¨åˆ°this?ä¸‹é¢å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä¸€ä¸ªä¾‹å­è¯´æ˜ã€‚ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031//ä½¿ç”¨thisçš„æƒ…å†µlet Tom = { name: "Tom" }, Jerry = { name: "Jerry" };function identify() { return this.name.toUpperCase();}function speak() { let greeting = "Hello, I am " + identify.call(this); console.log(greeting);}console.log(identify.call(Tom)); // TOMconsole.log(identify.call(Jerry)); // JERRYspeak.call(Tom); // Hello, I am TOMspeak.call(Jerry); // Hello, I am JERRY//ä¸ä½¿ç”¨thisçš„æƒ…å†µfunction identify(context) { return context.name.toUpperCase();}function speak(context) { let greeting = "Hello, I am " + identify(context); console.log(greeting);}identify(Tom); // TOMspeak(Jerry) // Hello, I am JERRY é€šè¿‡ä¸Šé¢çš„ä»£ç æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸éš¾å‘ç°ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸ä½¿ç”¨this,å°±éœ€è¦ç»™identify()å’Œspeak()æ˜¾å¼ä¼ å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œéšç€ä½ çš„ä½¿ç”¨æ¨¡å¼è¶Šæ¥è¶Šå¤æ‚ï¼Œæ˜¾å¼ä¼ é€’ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ä¼šè®©ä»£ç å˜å¾—è¶Šæ¥è¶Šæ··ä¹±ï¼Œå¯è§thisæä¾›äº†ä¸€ç§æ›´ä¼˜é›…çš„æ–¹å¼æ¥éšå¼â€ä¼ é€’â€ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡çš„å¼•ç”¨ï¼Œå› æ­¤å¯ä»¥å°†APIè®¾è®¡å¾—æ›´åŠ ç®€æ´å¹¶ä¸”æ˜“äºå¤ç”¨ã€‚ å…³äºthisçš„ä¸¤ä¸ªå¸¸è§è¯¯åŒº æŒ‡å‘è‡ªèº«(ä¸¾ä¸ªğŸŒ°) 123456789function callCount() { this.count++;}callCount.count = 0;for (let i=0;i<10;i++){ if (i>5){ callCount() }} ä¸éš¾å‘ç°callCount()ä¼šè¢«è°ƒç”¨å››æ¬¡ä½†æ˜¯callCount.count = 0ï¼ŒåŸå› åœ¨äºæ­¤æ—¶çš„thisæŒ‡å‘window,é‚£ä¹ˆæˆ‘ä»¬å¾ˆå®¹æ˜“è”æƒ³åˆ°window.count = 4,ä½†æ˜¯ç»“æœæ˜¯NaNã€‚å› ä¸ºåœ¨éä¸¥æ ¼æ¨¡å¼ä¸‹countä¼šæå‰å£°æ˜ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå€¼ä¸ºundefined,è¿›è¡Œæ•°å­—è¿ç®—æ—¶å¾—å‡ºç»“æœNaN(æ•°æ®ç±»å‹çš„å…¨é¢è§£æè¿™ç¯‡æ–‡ç« æœ‰è¯¦ç»†ä»‹ç»æ•°æ®ä¹‹é—´çš„è½¬æ¢è§„åˆ™) æŒ‡å‘ä»–çš„ä½œç”¨åŸŸ123456789101112var a = 2;function foo() { var a = 1; this.bar()}function bar() { console.log(this.a);}foo(); // 2 ä»£ç æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶ï¼Œæµè§ˆå™¨ä¼šåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå…¨å±€çš„æ‰§è¡Œä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡(EC(G))ï¼Œè¿›å…¥æ‰§è¡Œç¯å¢ƒæ ˆ(ECS)ä¸­æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œè¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ä¼šè¿›è¡Œå˜é‡å’Œå‡½æ•°æå‡ï¼Œå˜é‡å¯¹è±¡(VO)å­˜å‚¨å½“å‰ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å˜é‡å’Œå€¼ï¼Œå½¢æˆç§æœ‰ä½œç”¨åŸŸ(scope)å’Œä½œç”¨åŸŸé“¾(scope chain)ï¼Œå‡½æ•°æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶ï¼Œä¼šå½¢æˆä¸€ä¸ªå…¨æ–°çš„æ‰§è¡Œä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡,è¿›å…¥æ‰§è¡Œç¯å¢ƒæ ˆ(ECS)ä¸­æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œæ´»åŠ¨å¯¹è±¡(AO)å­˜å‚¨å‡½æ•°å†…çš„å½¢å‚ã€å˜é‡å’Œå€¼ï¼ŒåŒæ ·ä¼šå½¢æˆç§æœ‰ä½œç”¨åŸŸå’Œä½œç”¨åŸŸé“¾ã€‚æ­¤æ—¶çš„thiså¹¶ä¸æ˜¯fooæ‰§è¡Œä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ä¸‹çš„ä½œç”¨åŸŸè€Œæ˜¯æ‰§è¡Œwindowã€‚ å¦‚ä½•ç¡®å®šthis thisæ˜¯åœ¨è°ƒç”¨æ—¶è¿›è¡Œç»‘å®šçš„ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸æ˜¯åœ¨å£°æ˜æ—¶ç¡®å®šçš„ï¼Œthisçš„ç»‘å®šå’Œå‡½æ•°å£°æ˜çš„ä½ç½®æ²¡æœ‰ä»»ä½•å…³ç³»ï¼Œå®Œå…¨å–å†³äºå‡½æ•°çš„è°ƒç”¨æ–¹å¼ã€‚ é»˜è®¤ç»‘å®š12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031var a = 1;function foo() { console.log(this.a);}var obj = { a: 2, foo};var bar = obj.foo; // å¯ä»¥çœ‹ä½œæ˜¯fooçš„å¼•ç”¨æ”¾å…¥äº†å…¨å±€ECSæ‰§è¡Œã€‚thisæŒ‡å‘windowfoo(); // 1bar(); // 1/* ä½œä¸ºå›è°ƒå‡½æ•° */function foo() { console.log(this.a);}function doFoo(fn) { fn();}var obj = { a: 2, foo};var a = "global";doFoo(obj.foo); // "global" æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„è·Ÿbar()æ‰§è¡ŒåŸç†setTimeout(obj.foo, 100); // "global" è·Ÿbar()æ‰§è¡ŒåŸç† åœ¨éä¸¥æ ¼æ¨¡å¼ä¸‹thisæŒ‡å‘windowï¼Œä¸¥æ ¼æ¨¡å¼ä¸‹thisä¼šç»‘å®šåˆ°undefined éšå¼ç»‘å®š 1234567891011var obj2 = { a: 42, foo: foo};var obj1 = { a:2, obj2}obj2.foo(); // 42 thisæŒ‡å‘obj2obj1.obj2.foo(); // 42 thisæŒ‡å‘obj2 æ˜¾å¼ç»‘å®š 12345678910function foo() { console.log(this.a);}var obj = { a: 2}foo.call(obj) // 2foo.apply(obj) // 2foo.bind(obj)() // 2 ä¸€æ—¦è¢«bindã€callã€applyç»‘å®šåä¸å¯èƒ½å†ä¿®æ”¹å®ƒçš„this12345678910111213var obj = { a: 2};function foo(num) { return this.a + num;}function bar() { return foo.apply(obj, arguments);}bar(3); // 5 æ„é€ å‡½æ•°é‡Œçš„this ä½¿ç”¨newæ¥è°ƒç”¨æ„é€ å‡½æ•°å’Œç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨æ™®é€šå‡½æ•°çš„åŒºåˆ« åˆ›å»ºï¼ˆæ„é€ ï¼‰ä¸€ä¸ªå…¨æ–°çš„å¯¹è±¡ä½œä¸ºå®ä¾‹å¯¹è±¡ å°†è¿™ä¸ªæ–°å¯¹è±¡çš„__proto__æŒ‡å‘æ„é€ å‡½æ•°çš„prototypeå¯¹è±¡ è¿™ä¸ªæ–°å¯¹è±¡ä¼šç»‘å®šåˆ°å‡½æ•°è°ƒç”¨çš„this æ‰§è¡Œå‡½æ•°ä¸­çš„ä»£ç å¦‚æœå‡½æ•°æ²¡æœ‰è¿”å›å…¶ä»–å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå‡½æ•°æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆåä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨è¿”å›è¿™ä¸ªæ–°å¯¹è±¡123456function Foo(name) { this.name = name; console.log(this);}var bar = new Foo("Tom"); // thiså°±æ˜¯barè¿™ä¸ªå®ä¾‹å¯¹è±¡ ç®­å¤´å‡½æ•°ä¸­çš„this ç®­å¤´å‡½æ•°å’Œæ™®é€šå‡½æ•°çš„åŒºåˆ« ç®­å¤´å‡½æ•°æ²¡æœ‰è‡ªå·±çš„this,è€Œæ˜¯å®šä¹‰æ—¶ä¸Šçº§æ‰§è¡Œä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ä¸­ æœ¬èº«æ²¡æœ‰argumentså¯¹è±¡,ä¹Ÿæ²¡æœ‰prototypeå¯¹è±¡ ä¸èƒ½å½“ä½œæ„é€ å‡½æ•°ä½¿ç”¨ ç®­å¤´å‡½æ•°çš„thisç»‘å®šåæ— æ³•è¢«callã€applyã€bindã€newä¿®æ”¹123456789var obj = { a: 2}function foo() { setTimeout(()=>{ console.log(this.a); },100)}foo.call(obj) // ç®­å¤´å‡½æ•°thisæ˜¯fooé‡Œçš„this äº‹ä»¶ç»‘å®š 123456document.getElementById('btn').onclick = function (e) { console.log(this); } // thisæŒ‡å‘å½“å‰å…ƒç´ æœ¬èº«document.getElementById('btn').addEventListener("click",function () { console.log(this);
